description: This schema defines data format used along the gathering process.

references.description: A csv file encodes a number of record that may contain multiple fields separeated from each other by a comma character. Each record is located on a separate line, delimited by a line break (CRLF).
A tsv file encodes a number of records that may contain multiple fields. Each field value is represented as text which are separated from each other by a tab character.
